- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-763">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-763">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-764">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-764">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-765">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-765">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-766">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-766">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-767">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-767">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-768">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-768">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-769">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-769">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-770">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-770">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-771">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-771">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-772">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-772">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-773">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-773">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-774">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-775">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-775">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-776">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-777">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-777">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-778">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-778">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-779">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-779">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-780">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-781">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-781">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-784">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-784">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-785">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-785">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-793">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-793">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-800">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-800">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-802">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-802">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-803">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-803">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-804">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-805">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-805">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-806">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-806">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-807">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-807">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-808">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-808">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-809">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-809">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-810">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-810">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-811">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-811">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-812">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-812">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-813">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-813">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-814">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-815">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-815">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-818">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-818">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-819">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-819">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-820">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-820">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-834">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-834">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-835">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-836">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-836">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-837">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-837">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-838">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-838">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-839">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-839">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-840">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-840">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-841">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-842">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-842">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-843">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-843">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-844">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-844">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-845">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-846">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-846">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-849">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-849">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-850">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-850">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-851">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-852">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-852">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-853">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-853">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-854">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-855">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-855">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-856">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-856">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-857">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-857">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-858">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-858">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-859">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-859">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-860">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-860">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-861">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-861">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-862">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-863">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-863">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-864">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-864">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-865">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-865">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-866">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-866">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-867">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-867">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-868">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-868">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-869">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-870">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-870">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-871">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-872">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-873">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-873">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-874">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-874">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-875">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-876">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-876">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-879">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-879">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-880">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-880">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-881">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-881">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-882">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-882">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-883">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-883">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-884">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-884">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-885">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-885">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-886">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-886">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-887">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-887">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-888">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-888">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-889">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-889">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-890">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-891">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-891">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-892">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-892">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-893">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-893">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-894">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-894">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-895">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-895">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-896">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-897">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-897">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-898">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-898">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-899">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-900">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-900">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-901">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-902">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-902">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-903">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-903">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-904">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-904">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-905">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-905">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-906">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-906">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-907">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-907">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-908">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-908">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-909">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-909">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-910">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-910">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-911">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-911">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-912">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-912">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-913">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-913">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-928">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-928">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-929">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-929">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-930">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-930">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-931">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-931">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-932">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-932">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-933">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-933">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-934">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-934">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-935">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-936">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-936">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-937">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-938">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-939">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-939">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-940">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-940">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-941">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-941">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-942">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-943">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-943">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-944">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-945">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-945">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-946">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-947">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-950">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-950">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-951">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-951">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-973">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-973">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-975">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-975">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-977">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-977">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-978">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-978">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-979">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-979">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-980">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-980">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-981">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-981">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-982">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-982">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-983">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-984">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-984">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-987">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-987">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-988">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-988">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-989">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-989">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-990">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-990">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-991">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-991">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1051">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1052">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1053">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1054">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1056">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1057">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1058">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1059">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1061">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1062">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1063">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1063">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1065">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1065">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1066">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1066">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1067">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1067">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1068">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1068">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1069">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1069">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1070">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1070">reisepass kein</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1072">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1073">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1074">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1075">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1076">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1077">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1078">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1079">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1082">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1083">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1105">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1105">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1106">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1107">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1107">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1108">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1108">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1109">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1109">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1110">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1110">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1111">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1111">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1112">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1112">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1113">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1113">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1114">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1114">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1115">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1116">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1116">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1117">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1117">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1118">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1119">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1119">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1121">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1122">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1122">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1123">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1123">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1125">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1125">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1129">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1129">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1130">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1130">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1131">numéro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1131">numéro t.v.a</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1136">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1136">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1137">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1137">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1138">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1139">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1139">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1141">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1141">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1142">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1142">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1143">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1143">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1144">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1144">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1145">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1145">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1146">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1146">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1147">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1147">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1148">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1148">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1149">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1149">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1150">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1150">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1155">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1155">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1156">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1156">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1157">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1159">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1159">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1160">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1172">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1172">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1174">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1174">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1176">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1176">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1177">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1177">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1178">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1178">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1179">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1180">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1180">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1181">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1181">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1182">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1182">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1183">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1183">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1184">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1184">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1185">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1185">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1186">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1187">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1187">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1188">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1189">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1190">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1190">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1191">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1191">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1192">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1192">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1193">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1194">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1194">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1195">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1217">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1217">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1218">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1219">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1219">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1221">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1221">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1222">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1222">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1223">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1223">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1224">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1224">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1225">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1226">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1226">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1227">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1228">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1228">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1229">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1229">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1231">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1232">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1232">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1233">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1233">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1234">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1237">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1237">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1238">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1238">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1239">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1239">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1240">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1241">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1241">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1242">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1242">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1249">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1249">número de rregistro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1253">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1253">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1254">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1254">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1255">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1257">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1257">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1259">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1259">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1260">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1261">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1264">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1264">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1265">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1265">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1284">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1284">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1286">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1286">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1288">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1288">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1289">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1289">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1290">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1290">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1291">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1291">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1292">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1292">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1294">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1294">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1297">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1297">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1298">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1298">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1300">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1300">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1306">고 대 cn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1306">bucn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1307">edinen grazhdanski nomer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1307">edinen grazhdanski nomer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1308">egn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1308">egn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1309">egn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1309">egn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1310">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1310">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1311">

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1345">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1345">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1346">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1346">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1347">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1348">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1348">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1349">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1350">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1350">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1351">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1352">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1352">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1354">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1355">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1355">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1356">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1356">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1357">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1357">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1359">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1359">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1360">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1360">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1361">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1361">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1362">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1362">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1363">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1363">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1364">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1365">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1365">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1367">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1367">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1368">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1368">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1369">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1369">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1370">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1370">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1371">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1371">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1372">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1372">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1373">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1373">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1374">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1375">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1377">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1378">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1378">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1379">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1379">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1380">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1380">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1382">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1382">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1383">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1383">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1407">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1407">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1409">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1409">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1411">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1411">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1416">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1416">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1417">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1417">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1418">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
