## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1554">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1554">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1556">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1556">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1558">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1558">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1560">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1560">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1563">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1563">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1564">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1564">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1565">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1565">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1567">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1567">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1568">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1568">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1569">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1569">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1570">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1570">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1571">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1571">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1572">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1572">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1573">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1573">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1574">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1574">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1576">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1576">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1577">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1578">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1578">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1580">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1580">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1582">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1584">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1585">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1585">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1586">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1586">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1616">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1616">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1617">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1618">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1618">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1619">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1620">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1620">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1622">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1625">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1625">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1626">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1626">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1659">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1659">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1661">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1661">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1663">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1663">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1664">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1664">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1665">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1665">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1666">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1666">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1667">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1667">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1668">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1668">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1669">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1669">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1674">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1674">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1675">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1675">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1676">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1676">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1677">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1677">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1678">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1678">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1679">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1681">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1681">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1682">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1682">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1683">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1683">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1708">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1708">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1709">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1710">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1710">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1711">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1712">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1712">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1713">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1713">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1714">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1714">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1715">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1715">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1716">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1716">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1717">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1717">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1718">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1718">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1719">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1719">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1720">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1721">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1721">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1724">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1724">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1725">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1725">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1726">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1726">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1727">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1728">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1728">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1729">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1729">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1730">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1730">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1731">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1731">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1738">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1738">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1739">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1739">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1743">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1743">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1744">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1744">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1745">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1746">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1746">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1747">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1748">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1748">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1749">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1749">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1750">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1750">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1751">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1751">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1752">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1752">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1754">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1754">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1757">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1757">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1758">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1758">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1759">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1761">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1761">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1762">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1763">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1763">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1764">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1764">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1765">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1765">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1766">중국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1766">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1767">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1767">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1768">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1768">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1769">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1769">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1770">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1770">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1771">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1771">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1773">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1773">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1774">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1774">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1775">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1775">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1776">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1777">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1777">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1779">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1779">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1780">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1781">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1781">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1784">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1784">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1785">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1785">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1786">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1786">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1787">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1787">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1788">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1789">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1790">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1791">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1791">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-1792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-1792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2052">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2052">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2053">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2053">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2054">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2055">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2055">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2057">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2057">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2059">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2059">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2062">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2062">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2063">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2063">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2064">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2064">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2079">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2079">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2080">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2080">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2081">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2082">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2082">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2084">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2084">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2085">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2086">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2089">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2089">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2090">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2090">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2121">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2121">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2122">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2122">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2124">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2124">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2126">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2126">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2128">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2128">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2130">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2131">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2131">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2132">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2132">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2133">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2133">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2135">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2136">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2136">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2137">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2137">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2138">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2138">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2139">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2139">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2140">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2141">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2141">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2142">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2143">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2143">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2144">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2144">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2145">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2145">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2146">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2147">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2147">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2150">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2150">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2151">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2151">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2152">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2152">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2153">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2154">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2154">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2155">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2155">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2186">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2186">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2187">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2189">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2189">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2191">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2191">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2192">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2192">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2193">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2193">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2194">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2195">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2198">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2198">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2199">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2199">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2200">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2201">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2201">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2202">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2202">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2203">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2203">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2204">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2204">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2205">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2205">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2206">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2206">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2218">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2218">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2219">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2219">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2220">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2221">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2221">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2222">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2223">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2223">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2224">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2225">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2225">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2228">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2228">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2229">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2229">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2239">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2239">driver's license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2241">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2241">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2244">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2244">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2245">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2246">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2246">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2248">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2248">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2249">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2250">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2250">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2251">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2252">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2253">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2253">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2254">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2254">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2255">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2255">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2256">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2256">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2257">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2257">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2258">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2258">identity card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2262">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2262">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2263">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2263">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2266">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2266">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2268">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2268">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2269">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2270">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2270">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2271">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2272">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2273">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2273">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2274">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2274">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2275">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2275">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2277">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2277">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2278">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2278">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2279">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2279">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2281">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2281">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2282">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2283">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2283">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2284">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2285">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2285">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2286">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2286">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2287">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2288">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2289">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2290">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2290">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2292">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2293">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2293">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2294">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2294">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2296">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2296">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2298">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2298">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2299">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2299">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2324">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2324">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2325">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2325">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2326">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2327">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2327">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2328">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2329">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2329">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2330">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2330">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2331">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2331">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2332">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2332">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2333">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2334">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2334">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2335">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2336">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2336">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2337">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2337">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2338">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2338">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2339">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2339">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2343">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2343">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2344">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2344">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2350">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2350">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2351">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2351">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2352">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2352">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2355">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2355">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2356">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2358">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2358">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2360">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2360">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2362">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2365">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2365">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2366">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2366">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2367">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2368">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2368">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2369">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2369">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2370">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2370">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2371">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2371">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2372">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2372">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2373">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2373">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2374">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2374">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2375">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2376">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2376">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2377">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2378">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2378">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2379">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2379">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2380">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2380">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2381">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2381">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2382">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2382">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2383">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2383">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2384">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2384">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2385">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2385">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2390">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2390">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2391">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2391">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2392">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2394">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2394">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2395">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2442">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2442">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2443">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2445">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2445">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2447">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2447">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2448">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2448">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2449">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2449">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2450">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2450">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2451">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2451">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2452">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2455">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2455">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2456">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2456">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2457">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2457">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2459">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2459">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2475">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2475">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2476">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2477">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2478">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2478">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2480">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2480">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2481">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2482">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2482">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2485">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2485">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2486">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2486">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
