## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2503">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2503">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2504">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2506">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2506">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2508">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2508">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2510">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2510">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2513">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2513">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2514">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2514">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2515">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2517">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2517">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2518">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2518">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2519">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2519">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2520">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2520">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2521">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2521">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2522">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2522">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2523">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2523">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2524">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2525">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2525">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2527">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2527">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2528">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2528">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2529">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2529">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2530">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2530">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2531">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2532">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2535">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2535">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2536">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2536">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2537">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2538">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2539">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2539">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2612">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2612">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2613">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2613">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2615">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2615">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2617">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2617">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2618">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2618">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2619">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2619">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2620">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2620">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2622">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2622">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2624">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2625">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2625">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2626">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2626">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2628">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2628">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2631">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2631">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2632">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2632">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2633">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2633">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2634">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2634">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2635">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2635">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2636">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2636">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2637">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2637">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2638">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2638">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2639">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2639">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2640">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2640">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2641">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2641">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2642">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2642">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2643">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2644">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2644">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2646">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2646">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2647">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2647">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2648">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2648">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2649">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2649">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2654">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2654">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2655">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2656">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2656">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2657">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2657">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2658">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2658">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2661">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2661">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2663">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2663">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2664">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2664">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2665">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2665">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2666">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2667">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2667">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2669">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2670">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2670">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2671">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2671">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2672">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2672">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2673">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2673">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2674">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2674">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2675">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2675">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2676">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2676">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2677">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2677">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2678">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2678">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2679">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2679">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2680">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2680">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2681">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2681">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2682">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2682">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2683">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2683">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2684">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2684">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2685">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2685">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2686">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2686">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2687">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2687">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2688">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2689">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2689">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2690">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2691">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2691">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2692">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2692">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2693">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2693">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2694">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2694">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2695">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2695">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2697">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2700">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2700">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2701">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2701">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2703">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2703">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2736">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2736">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2737">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2737">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2738">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2739">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2739">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2741">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2741">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2742">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2743">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2743">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2744">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2745">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2745">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2746">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2746">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2747">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2747">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2748">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2748">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2749">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2749">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2750">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2750">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2751">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2751">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2752">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2752">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2754">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2754">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2755">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2756">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2756">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2758">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2758">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2759">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2760">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2760">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2763">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2763">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2764">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2764">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2765">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2765">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2766">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2766">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2767">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2767">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2768">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2768">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2769">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2769">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-2770">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-2770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- [<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3196">라트비아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3196">Latvia</span></span>](#latvia-tax-identification-number)
- [<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3197">리투아니아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3197">Lithuania</span></span>](#lithuania-tax-identification-number)
- [<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3198">셈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3198">Luxemburg</span></span>](#luxemburg-tax-identification-number)
- [<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3199">몰타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3199">Malta</span></span>](#malta-tax-identification-number)

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3209">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3209">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3210">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3210">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3211">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3212">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3212">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3214">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3214">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3215">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3215">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3216">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3216">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3217">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3217">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3219">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3219">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3222">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3222">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3223">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3223">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3224">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3224">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3226">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3226">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3228">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3228">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3229">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3229">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3230">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3230">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3231">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3231">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3232">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3232">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3233">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3233">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3234">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3234">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3235">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3235">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3236">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3236">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3237">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3237">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3238">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3238">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3239">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3239">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3240">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3241">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3241">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3243">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3243">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3244">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3244">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3245">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3245">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3246">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3246">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3247">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3251">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3251">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3252">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3252">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3253">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3253">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3258">finsjukförsäkringskort a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3258">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3259">건강 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3259">health card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3260">건강 보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3260">health insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3261">건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3261">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3262">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3262">hälsokort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3263">sairaanhoitokortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3263">sairaanhoitokortin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3264">sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3264">sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3267">sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3267">sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3268">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3268">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3269">terveyskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3269">terveyskortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3270">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3270">Finland national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3271">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3272">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3272">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3274">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3274">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3275">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3275">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3276">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3276">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3277">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3277">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3278">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3278">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3279">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3280">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3280">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3282">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3282">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3283">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3283">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3284">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3284">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3285">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3285">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3286">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3286">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3287">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3287">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3288">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3288">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3337">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3337">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3338">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3338">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3339">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3339">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3340">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3340">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3341">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3341">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3342">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3342">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3343">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3343">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3344">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3344">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3345">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3346">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3346">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3347">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3348">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3349">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3349">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3350">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3350">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3351">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3351">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3352">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3352">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3353">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3353">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3354">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3354">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3355">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3355">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3356">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3358">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3358">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3360">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3360">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3361">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3361">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3362">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3362">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3363">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3363">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3364">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3364">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3365">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3365">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3366">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3366">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3367">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3367">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3368">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3369">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3369">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3371">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3371">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3372">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3372">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3373">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3373">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3374">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3374">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3375">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3375">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3386">국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3386">national id number</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3399">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3399">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3400">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3400">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3402">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3402">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3403">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3404">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3404">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3405">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3405">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3406">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3406">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3407">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3407">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3408">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3408">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3409">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3409">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3410">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3410">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3411">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3411">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3412">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3412">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3413">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3413">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3415">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3415">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3416">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3416">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3417">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3417">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3418">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3418">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3419">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3419">permis de conduire</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3421">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3421">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3422">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3422">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3423">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3423">license numbers</span></span>


## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3424">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3424">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3426">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3426">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3428">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3428">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3429">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3429">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3430">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3430">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3431">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3431">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3432">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3433">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3433">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3434">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3435">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3436">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3437">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3438">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3438">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3439">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3439">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3440">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3440">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3441">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3441">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3442">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3442">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3443">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3443">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3444">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3444">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3445">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3445">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3447">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3447">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3449">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3449">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3453">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3454">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3454">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3455">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3455">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3456">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3456">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3457">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3457">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3458">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3460">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3460">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3461">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3461">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3462">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3462">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3463">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3463">compte bancaire</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3465">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3465">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3467">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3467">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3469">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3469">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3470">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3470">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3471">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3472">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3472">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3473">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3474">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3474">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3475">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3475">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3476">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3476">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3477">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3477">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3478">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3479">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3479">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3481">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3482">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3482">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3483">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3483">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3484">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3484">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3485">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3485">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3486">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3486">Passport Number</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3504">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3504">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3505">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3505">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3506">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3507">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3507">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3509">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3509">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3510">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3510">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3511">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3511">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3512">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3512">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3513">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3514">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3514">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3515">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3516">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3516">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3517">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3517">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3518">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3518">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3519">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3519">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3520">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3520">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3521">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3521">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3522">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3522">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
