## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3549">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3549">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3550">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3551">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3551">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3552">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3553">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3553">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3554">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3554">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3555">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3555">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3556">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3556">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3557">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3557">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3558">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3558">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3559">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3559">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3560">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3560">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3561">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3561">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3562">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3562">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3563">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3563">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3564">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3565">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3566">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3567">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3567">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3568">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3568">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3569">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3569">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3570">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3571">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3571">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3589">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3589">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3590">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3590">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3591">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3591">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3593">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3593">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3594">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3595">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3595">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3596">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3596">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3597">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3597">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3598">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3598">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3599">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3599">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3600">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3600">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3601">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3601">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3602">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3602">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3603">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3603">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3604">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3604">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3605">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3605">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3606">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3606">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3607">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3607">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3608">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3608">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3609">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3609">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3610">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3610">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3611">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3611">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3612">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3612">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3613">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3613">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3615">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3615">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3616">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3616">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3617">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3617">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3618">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3618">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3619">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3619">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3620">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3620">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3621">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3621">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3622">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3622">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3623">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3623">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3624">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3624">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3625">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3625">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3626">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3626">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3627">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3628">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3628">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3630">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3630">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3631">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3631">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3632">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3632">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3633">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3633">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3634">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3634">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3635">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3635">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3637">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3637">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3640">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3640">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3641">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3641">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3642">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3642">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3643">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3643">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3644">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3644">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3645">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3645">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3738">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3738">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3739">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3740">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3740">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3741">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3741">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3742">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3743">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3743">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3744">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3744">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3745">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3745">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3746">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3746">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3747">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3747">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3748">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3749">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3749">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3751">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3751">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3752">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3752">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3753">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3753">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3754">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3754">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3755">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3755">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3758">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3758">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3759">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3759">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3760">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3760">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3761">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3761">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3762">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3762">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3763">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3763">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3764">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3764">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3765">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3765">personalausweis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3767">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3767">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3768">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3768">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3769">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3769">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3770">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3771">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3772">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3772">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3774">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3774">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3775">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3775">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3776">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3776">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3777">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3777">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3778">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3778">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3780">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3783">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3783">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3784">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3784">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3785">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3786">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3787">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3787">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3788">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3788">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3789">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3790">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3790">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3791">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3791">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3792">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3792">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3793">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3793">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3794">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3794">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3795">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3795">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3796">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3796">passports</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3807">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3807">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3808">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3809">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3809">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3810">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3811">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3811">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3812">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3812">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3813">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3813">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3814">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3814">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3815">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3815">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3816">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3816">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3817">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3817">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3818">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3818">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3819">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3819">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3820">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3821">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3821">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3823">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3824">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3824">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3825">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3825">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3826">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3827">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3827">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3837">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3837">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3853">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3853">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3854">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3855">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3855">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3856">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3857">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3857">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3858">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3858">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3859">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3859">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3860">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3860">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3861">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3861">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3862">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3862">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3863">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3863">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3864">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3864">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3865">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3865">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3870">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3870">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3871">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3871">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3873">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3873">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3875">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3875">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3876">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3876">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3877">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3877">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3878">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3878">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3879">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3879">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3880">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3880">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3881">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3881">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3882">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3882">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3883">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3883">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3884">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3884">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3885">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3886">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3886">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3888">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3888">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3889">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3890">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3891">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3893">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3893">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3894">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3894">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3911">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3911">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3912">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3912">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3913">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3913">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3914">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3914">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3915">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3915">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3916">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3916">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3917">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3917">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3918">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3918">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3919">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3919">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3920">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3920">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3921">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3921">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3922">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3922">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3923">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3924">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3924">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3925">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3927">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3927">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3928">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3928">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3929">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3929">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3930">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3930">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3935">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3935">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3936">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3936">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3941">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3941">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3942">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3942">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3943">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3944">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3944">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3945">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3945">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3946">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3946">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3947">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3948">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3949">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3950">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3951">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3951">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3952">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3952">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3953">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3953">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3954">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3954">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3955">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3955">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3956">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3956">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3957">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3957">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3958">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3958">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3959">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3959">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3960">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3961">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3961">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3962">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3963">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3963">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3965">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3965">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3968">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3968">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3969">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3969">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3995">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3995">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3996">τον αριθμό φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3996">τον αριθμό φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3997">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3997">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span></span>


## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3998">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3998">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-3999">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-3999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4000">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4000">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4001">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4001">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4002">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4002">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4003">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4003">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4004">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4004">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4005">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4005">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4007">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4007">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4010">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4010">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4011">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4011">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4012">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4012">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4013">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4013">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4014">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4014">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4015">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4015">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4055">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4055">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4056">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4057">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4058">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4058">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4060">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4060">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4061">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4061">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4062">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4062">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4063">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4064">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4064">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4065">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4066">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4066">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4067">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4067">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4068">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4068">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4069">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4069">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4070">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4070">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4071">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4071">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4072">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4072">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4073">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4073">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4074">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4074">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4075">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4075">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4076">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4076">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4077">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4077">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4078">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4078">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4079">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4079">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4080">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4080">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4081">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4081">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4082">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4082">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4083">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4083">vezetoi engedely</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4084">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4084">Hungary national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4085">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4085">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4086">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4087">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4087">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4089">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4089">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4090">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4090">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4091">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4091">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4092">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4092">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4093">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4093">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4094">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4095">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4095">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4098">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4098">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4099">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4099">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4101">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4101">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4112">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4112">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4113">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4113">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4115">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4115">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4117">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4117">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4118">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4119">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4119">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4121">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4122">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4122">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4123">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4123">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4124">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4124">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4125">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4125">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4126">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4126">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4127">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4127">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4128">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4128">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4129">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4129">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4130">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4130">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4131">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4133">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4133">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4135">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4135">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4137">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4140">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4140">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4141">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4141">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4143">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4143">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4145">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4145">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4163">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4163">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4164">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4164">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4165">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4166">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4166">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4168">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4168">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4169">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4169">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4170">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4170">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4171">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4171">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4172">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4172">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4173">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4174">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4174">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4176">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4177">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4177">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4178">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4178">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4179">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4180">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4180">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4206">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4206">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4207">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4208">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4208">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4209">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4210">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4210">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4211">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4211">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4212">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4212">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4213">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4213">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4218">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4218">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4219">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4219">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4220">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4221">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4221">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
