- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4233">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4233">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4234">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4234">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4235">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4235">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4237">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4237">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4239">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4239">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4240">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4240">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4241">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4241">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4242">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4242">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4244">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4244">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4247">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4247">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4248">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4248">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4249">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4249">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4250">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4250">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4251">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4251">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4252">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4252">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4253">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4253">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4254">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4254">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4255">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4256">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4256">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4258">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4258">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4259">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4259">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4260">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4260">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4261">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4261">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4262">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4262">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4263">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4263">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4264">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4264">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4265">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4265">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4266">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4266">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4267">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4268">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4268">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4269">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4269">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4270">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4270">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4271">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4271">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4272">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4272">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4273">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4273">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4280">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4280">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4281">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4282">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4282">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4283">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4284">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4284">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4285">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4285">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4286">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4286">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4287">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4287">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4288">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4288">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4289">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4289">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4290">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4290">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4291">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4291">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4292">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4292">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4294">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4294">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4297">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4297">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4298">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4298">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4299">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4299">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4300">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4300">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4301">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4301">KTP</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4303">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4303">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4304">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4304">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4305">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4306">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4306">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4307">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4308">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4308">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4309">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4309">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4310">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4310">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4311">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4311">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4312">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4312">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4313">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4313">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4314">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4314">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4315">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4315">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4316">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4317">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4317">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4318">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4319">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4319">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4320">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4320">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4321">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4321">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4322">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4322">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4323">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4323">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4324">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4324">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4325">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4326">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4326">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4327">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4327">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4328">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4328">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4329">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4330">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4330">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4331">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4332">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4332">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4333">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4333">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4334">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4334">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4336">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4336">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4337">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4337">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4338">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4338">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4339">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4339">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4340">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4340">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4341">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4341">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4342">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4342">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4343">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4344">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4344">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4346">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4346">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4347">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4348">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4348">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4349">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4350">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4351">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4351">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4352">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4352">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4353">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4354">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4354">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4355">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4355">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4356">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4356">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4357">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4357">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4358">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4358">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4359">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4359">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4360">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4360">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4361">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4362">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4362">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4363">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4363">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4364">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4364">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4365">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4365">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4366">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4367">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4368">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4368">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4369">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4370">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4370">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4371">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4371">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4372">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4372">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4373">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4373">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4374">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4374">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4375">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4375">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4376">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4376">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4377">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4377">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4378">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4378">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4379">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4380">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4380">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4381">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4381">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4382">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4382">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4383">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4383">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4384">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4384">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4385">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4385">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4386">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4386">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4387">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4387">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4388">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4389">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4389">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4391">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4391">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4392">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4392">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4393">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4393">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4394">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4395">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4395">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4397">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4397">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4398">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4398">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4399">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4399">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4400">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4400">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4405">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4405">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4406">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4406">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4409">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4409">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4415">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4415">Ireland national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4416">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4416">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4417">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4418">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4418">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4420">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4420">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4421">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4421">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4422">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4422">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4423">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4423">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4424">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4424">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4425">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4425">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4426">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4426">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4427">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4427">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4428">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4428">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4430">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4430">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4433">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4433">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4434">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4434">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4435">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4436">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4436">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4437">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4437">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4438">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4438">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4439">클라이언트 id 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4439">client identity service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4440">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4440">identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4451">ppsno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4451">ppsno</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4465">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4465">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4466">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4467">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4468">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4468">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4470">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4470">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4471">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4471">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4472">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4472">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4473">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4474">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4474">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4475">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4476">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4476">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4477">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4477">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4478">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4478">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4479">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4479">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4480">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4480">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4481">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4481">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4482">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4482">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4483">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4483">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4484">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4484">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4485">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4485">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4486">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4486">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4487">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4487">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4488">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4488">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4489">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4490">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4490">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4491">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4491">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4492">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4492">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4493">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4493">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4494">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4495">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4495">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4496">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4496">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4497">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4497">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4498">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4498">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4499">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4499">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4500">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4500">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4501">문자 "A" 또는 "H" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4501">the letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4503">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4505">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4506">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4506">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4507">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4507">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4508">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4508">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4509">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4509">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4510">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4511">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4511">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4512">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4512">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4513">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4513">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4514">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4514">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4515">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4515">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4516">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4516">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4517">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4517">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4518">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4518">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4519">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4519">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4520">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4520">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4521">.PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4521">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4522">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4522">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4523">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4523">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4524">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4524">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4525">Uimh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4525">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4526">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4526">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4527">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4527">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4528">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4528">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4529">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4531">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4531">seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4533">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4533">seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4534">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4534">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4535">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4535">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4537">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4537">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4539">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4540">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4540">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4541">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4541">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4543">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4543">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4572">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4572">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4573">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4574">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4574">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4576">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4576">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4577">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4577">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4578">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4578">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4579">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4579">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4580">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4580">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4581">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4581">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4582">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4582">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4583">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4583">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4588">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4588">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4589">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4589">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4590">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4590">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4591">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4591">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4592">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4592">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4593">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4593">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4594">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4594">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4595">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4595">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4596">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4596">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4597">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4598">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4598">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4600">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4600">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4601">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4602">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4602">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4604">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4605">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4605">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4606">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4606">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4607">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4607">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4608">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4608">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4609">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4609">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4610">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4610">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4611">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4611">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4612">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4612">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4613">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4613">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4615">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4615">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4616">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4617">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4617">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4618">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4618">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4619">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4619">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4620">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4620">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4621">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4621">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4622">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4623">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4623">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4624">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4625">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4625">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4626">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4626">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4627">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4627">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4628">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4629">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4629">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4630">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4630">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4631">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4631">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4632">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4632">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4633">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4635">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4635">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4637">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4637">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4638">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4638">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4639">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4639">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4640">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4640">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4641">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4641">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4642">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4642">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4643">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4643">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4644">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4644">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4646">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4649">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4649">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4650">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4650">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4652">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4652">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
