## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4687">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4687">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4688">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4689">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4690">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4690">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4692">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4692">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4693">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4693">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4694">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4694">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4695">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4695">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4696">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4696">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4697">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4697">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4698">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4698">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4699">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4699">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4700">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4700">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4701">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4701">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4702">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4702">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4703">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4703">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4704">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4704">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4705">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4705">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4706">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4706">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4707">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4707">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4708">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4708">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4709">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4709">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4710">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4710">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4711">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4711">numéro passeport</span></span>


## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4712">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4712">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4713">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4713">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4714">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4715">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4715">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4716">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4717">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4717">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4718">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4718">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4719">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4719">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4720">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4720">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4721">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4721">one digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4722">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4722">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4723">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4723">four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4724">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4724">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4725">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4726">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4726">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4729">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4729">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4730">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4730">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4731">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4732">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4732">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4767">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4767">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4768">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4769">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4769">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4770">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4771">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4771">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4772">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4772">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4773">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4773">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4774">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4774">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4775">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4775">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4776">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4777">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4777">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4778">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4779">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4779">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4780">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4780">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4781">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4781">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4783">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4783">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4784">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4784">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4785">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4785">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4786">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4786">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4787">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4787">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4788">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4788">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4789">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4789">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4790">iva #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4790">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4791">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4791">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4792">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4793">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4793">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4795">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4795">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4796">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4796">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4797">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4797">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4798">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4798">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4799">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4799">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4800">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4800">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4801">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4802">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4804">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4804">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4805">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4805">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4806">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4806">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4807">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4807">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4808">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4809">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4811">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4812">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4871">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4871">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4873">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4873">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4875">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4875">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4876">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4877">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4880">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4880">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4881">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4909">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4909">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4910">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4911">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4911">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4912">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4913">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4913">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4914">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4914">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4915">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4915">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4916">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4917">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4917">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4919">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4920">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4920">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4921">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4921">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4923">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4923">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4924">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4924">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4936">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4936">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4937">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4938">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4938">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4939">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4940">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4940">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4941">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4941">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4942">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4942">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4943">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4943">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4944">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4944">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4945">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4945">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4946">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4947">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4947">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4949">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4950">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4950">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4951">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4951">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4952">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4952">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4953">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4953">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4954">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4954">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4955">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4955">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4956">내 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4956">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4957">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4957">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4958">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4958">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4959">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4959">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4960">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4960">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4961">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4961">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4962">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4962">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4963">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4963">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4964">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4964">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4965">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4965">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4966">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4966">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4967">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4968">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4968">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4970">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4970">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4971">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4972">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4972">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4975">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4975">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4976">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4976">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4977">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4977">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4978">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4978">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4979">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4979">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4980">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4980">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4981">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4981">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4982">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4982">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4983">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4983">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4984">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4985">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4985">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4986">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4987">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4987">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4988">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4988">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4989">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4989">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4990">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4990">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4991">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4992">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4992">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4993">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4994">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4995">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4995">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4996">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4996">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4997">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4997">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4998">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4998">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-4999">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-4999">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5000">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5000">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5001">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5001">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5002">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5002">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5003">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5003">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5004">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5005">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5005">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5007">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5007">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5008">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5009">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5012">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5012">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5013">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5013">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5014">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5014">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5015">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5015">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5016">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5016">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5017">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5017">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5018">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5018">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5019">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5019">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5020">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5020">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5021">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5021">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5022">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5022">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5023">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5023">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5024">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5024">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5025">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5025">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5026">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5026">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5027">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5027">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5028">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5029">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5029">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5030">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5031">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5031">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5032">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5032">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5033">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5033">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5034">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5034">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5035">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5035">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5036">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5037">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5037">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5038">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5039">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5040">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5040">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5041">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5041">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5043">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5043">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5044">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5044">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5045">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5045">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5046">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5046">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5047">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5047">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5048">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5048">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5049">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5049">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5050">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5050">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5051">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5051">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5052">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5052">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5053">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5053">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5054">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5055">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5055">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5057">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5057">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5058">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5058">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5059">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5059">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5060">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5061">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5061">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5063">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5064">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5064">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5065">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5065">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5071">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5071">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5072">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5072">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5075">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5075">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5076">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5076">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5077">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5077">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5078">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5078">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5081">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5081">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5082">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5082">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5083">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5084">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5084">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5085">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5086">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5086">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5087">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5087">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5088">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5088">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5089">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5089">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5090">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5090">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5091">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5092">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5093">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5095">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5095">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5096">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5096">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5098">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5098">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5112">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5161">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5161">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5162">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5162">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5163">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5164">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5164">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5166">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5166">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5167">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5167">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5168">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5168">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5169">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5173">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5173">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5174">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5174">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5175">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5175">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5176">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5176">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5177">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5177">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5178">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5178">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5179">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5179">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5180">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5180">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5181">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5181">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5182">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5184">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5184">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5186">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5186">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5187">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5187">six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5188">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5188">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5189">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5189">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5190">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5191">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5191">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5192">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5193">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5193">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5194">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5194">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5195">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5195">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5196">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5196">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5197">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5197">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5260">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5260">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5261">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5261">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5262">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5263">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5263">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5264">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5264">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5265">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5265">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5266">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5267">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5267">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5268">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5269">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5270">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5270">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5271">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5271">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5287">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5287">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5288">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5290">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5290">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5292">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5292">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5293">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5293">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5294">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5294">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5295">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5295">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5296">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5296">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5297">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5298">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5298">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5300">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5300">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5301">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5301">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5302">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5302">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5304">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5304">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5339">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5339">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5340">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5340">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5341">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5341">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5342">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5342">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5343">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5343">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5344">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5344">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5345">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5346">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5346">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5347">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5348">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5349">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5349">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5350">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5350">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5351">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5351">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5352">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5352">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5353">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5353">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5354">lithunian 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5354">lithunian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5355">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5355">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5356">numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5356">paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5357">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5357">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5358">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5358">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5359">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5360">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5360">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5362">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5362">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5363">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5364">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5364">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5367">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5367">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5368">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5368">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5370">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5370">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5404">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5404">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5405">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5405">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5406">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5406">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5407">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5407">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5408">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5408">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5409">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5409">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5411">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5411">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5414">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5414">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5415">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5415">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5416">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5416">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5417">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5417">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5418">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5418">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5419">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5419">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5420">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5420">driver license number</span></span>
