## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5431">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5431">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5432">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5432">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5433">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5434">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5434">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5435">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5436">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5436">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5437">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5437">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5438">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5438">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5439">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5439">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5440">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5440">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5442">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5442">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5445">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5445">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5446">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5446">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5469">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5469">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5470">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5470">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5471">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5472">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5472">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5473">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5474">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5474">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5475">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5476">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5477">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5478">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5478">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5479">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5479">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5480">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5480">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5481">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5481">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5487">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5487">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5488">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5488">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5489">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5490">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5490">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5491">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5492">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5492">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5493">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5493">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5494">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5494">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5495">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5496">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5496">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5499">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5499">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5500">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5500">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5502">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5502">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5509">룩셈부르크 세금 identifikatiounsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5509">luxembourg tax identifikatiounsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5510">numéro d'étain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5510">numéro d'étain</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5511">numéro d'identification 회계 luxembourgeois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5511">numéro d'identification fiscal luxembourgeois</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5513">소셜 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5513">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5514">sozialunterstützung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5514">sozialunterstützung</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5542">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5542">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5543">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5544">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5544">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5546">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5546">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5547">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5547">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5548">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5548">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5549">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5549">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5550">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5550">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5551">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5551">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5552">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5552">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5553">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5554">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5555">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5556">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5556">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5557">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5557">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5558">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5558">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5585">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5585">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5586">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5586">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5587">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5588">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5588">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5589">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5590">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5590">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5591">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5591">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5592">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5592">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5593">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5593">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5594">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5594">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5595">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5595">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5596">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5597">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5598">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5599">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5600">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5600">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5601">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5601">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5602">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5602">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5607">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5607">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5614">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5614">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5617">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5617">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5618">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5618">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5619">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5619">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5620">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5620">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5621">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5621">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5622">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5622">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5623">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5623">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5624">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5624">one uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5625">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5625">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5626">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5626">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5627">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5628">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5629">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5629">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5630">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5630">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5631">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5631">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5632">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5632">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5649">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5649">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5650">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5650">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5651">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5652">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5652">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5654">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5654">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5655">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5655">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5656">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5656">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5657">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5657">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5658">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5659">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5659">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5660">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5660">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5661">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5661">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5662">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5662">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5663">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5663">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5664">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5664">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5665">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5665">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5666">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5666">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5667">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5667">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5668">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5668">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5669">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5670">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5670">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5671">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5671">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5672">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5672">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5673">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5673">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5675">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5675">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5676">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5676">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5677">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5677">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5678">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5678">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5679">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5679">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5680">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5681">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5681">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5683">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5684">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5684">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5685">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5685">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5686">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5686">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5687">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5687">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5720">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5720">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5721">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5722">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5722">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5724">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5724">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5725">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5725">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5726">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5726">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5727">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5727">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5728">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5728">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5729">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5729">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5730">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5731">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5732">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5733">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5733">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5734">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5734">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5735">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5735">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5736">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5736">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5737">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5757">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5757">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5758">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5758">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5761">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5761">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5762">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5764">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5764">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5766">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5766">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5768">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5771">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5771">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5772">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5772">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5784">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5784">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5790">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5790">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5791">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5791">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5792">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5793">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5793">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5795">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5796">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5797">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5797">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5798">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5799">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5800">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5800">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5801">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5801">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5802">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5802">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5803">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5803">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5816">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5816">persoonsgebonden</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5827">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5827">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5828">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5828">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5829">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5830">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5830">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5832">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5832">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5833">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5834">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5834">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5835">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5836">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5837">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5837">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5838">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5838">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5839">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5839">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5841">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5841">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5842">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5842">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5843">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5843">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5844">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5844">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5845">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5845">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5846">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5846">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5847">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5847">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5848">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5848">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5849">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5849">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5850">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5851">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5851">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5852">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5853">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5853">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5854">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5855">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5855">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5858">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5858">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5859">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5859">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5860">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5860">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5861">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5861">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5899">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5899">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5900">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5901">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5901">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5903">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5903">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5904">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5904">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5905">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5905">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5906">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5906">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5907">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5907">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5908">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5908">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5909">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5909">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5910">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5910">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5911">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5912">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5912">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5913">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5914">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5914">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5915">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5915">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5916">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5916">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5918">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5918">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5927">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5927">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5928">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5929">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5929">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5930">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5931">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5931">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5932">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5932">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5933">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5933">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5934">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5934">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5935">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5935">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5936">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5936">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5937">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5937">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5938">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5938">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5939">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5939">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5941">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5943">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5944">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5944">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5945">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5945">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5946">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5947">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5947">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5955">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5955">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5956">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5956">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5957">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5957">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5958">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5958">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5959">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5959">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5960">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5960">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5961">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5961">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5962">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5963">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5965">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5966">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5966">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5967">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5967">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5968">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5968">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-5969">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-5969">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6036">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6036">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6037">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6038">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6038">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6040">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6040">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6041">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6041">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6042">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6042">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6043">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6043">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6044">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6044">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6045">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6045">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6046">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6047">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6048">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6049">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6049">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6050">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6050">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6051">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6051">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6052">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6052">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6053">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6053">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6054">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6054">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6055">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6055">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6056">ird 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6056">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6057">ird 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6057">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6058">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6058">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6059">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6059">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6060">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6060">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6061">inland 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6061">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6062">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6062">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6063">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6064">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6064">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6065">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6066">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6066">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6067">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6067">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6068">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6068">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6069">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6069">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6070">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6070">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6071">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6071">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6072">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6072">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6073">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6073">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6074">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6074">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6075">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6075">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6076">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6076">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6077">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6077">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6078">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6078">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6079">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6079">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6080">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6080">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6081">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6082">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6082">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6084">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6084">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6085">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6085">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6086">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6086">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6087">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6087">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6088">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6088">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6089">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6089">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6090">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6091">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6091">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6092">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6093">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6094">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6094">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6095">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6095">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6096">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6096">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6097">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6097">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6098">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6098">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6099">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6099">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6105">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6105">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6106">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6107">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6107">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6108">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6108">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6109">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6109">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6110">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6110">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6111">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6111">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6112">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6112">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6113">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6114">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6115">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6116">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6117">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6117">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6118">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6118">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6119">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6120">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6121">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6121">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6122">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
