## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6131">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6131">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6133">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6133">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6135">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6135">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6136">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6136">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6137">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6137">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6138">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6138">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6139">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6139">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6140">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6140">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6141">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6142">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6144">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6144">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6145">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6145">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6146">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6146">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6147">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6147">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6148">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6148">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6149">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6149">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6150">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6150">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6151">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6151">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6152">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6152">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6153">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6153">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6154">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6154">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6155">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6156">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6156">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6157">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6158">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6158">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6159">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6159">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6160">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6160">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6161">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6161">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6162">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6162">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6163">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6163">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6164">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6165">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6165">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6166">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6167">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6167">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6168">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6168">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6169">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6169">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6170">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6170">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6175">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6175">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6176">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6176">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6178">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6178">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6179">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6179">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6180">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6180">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6181">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6181">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6182">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6182">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6185">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6185">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6186">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6186">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6187">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6187">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6188">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6188">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6189">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6189">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6190">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6191">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6191">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6192">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6193">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6194">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6194">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6195">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6195">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6196">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6196">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6197">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6197">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6198">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6198">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6199">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6199">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6200">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6200">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6201">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6201">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6202">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6202">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6204">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6204">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6205">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6205">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6206">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6206">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6207">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6207">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6208">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6208">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6209">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6210">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6210">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6212">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6212">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6213">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6214">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6216">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6216">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6217">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6217">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6218">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6218">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6231">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6231">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6232">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6232">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6234">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6234">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6236">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6236">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6238">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6238">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6240">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6241">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6241">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6242">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6242">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6244">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6244">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6245">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6245">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6246">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6246">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6249">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6249">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6250">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6250">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6251">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6252">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6252">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6254">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6254">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6255">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6255">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6256">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6256">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6257">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6257">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6258">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6258">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6259">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6260">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6262">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6262">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6263">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6263">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6264">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6264">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6265">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6265">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6266">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6266">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6275">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6275">regonno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6278">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6278">companyidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6280">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6280">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6283">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6283">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6284">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6284">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6286">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6286">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6288">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6288">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6289">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6290">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6292">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6293">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6293">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6294">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6294">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6296">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6296">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6298">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6298">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6299">nip #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6299">nip#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6302">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6302">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6303">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6303">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6326">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6326">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6327">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6327">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6328">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6328">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6330">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6330">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6332">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6332">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6333">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6334">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6335">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6336">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6336">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6337">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6337">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6338">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6338">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6348">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6349">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6349">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6350">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6350">identity card number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6358">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6358">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6359">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6359">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6360">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6361">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6361">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6362">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6363">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6363">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6364">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6364">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6365">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6365">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6366">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6366">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6367">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6367">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6368">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6368">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6370">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6370">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6373">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6373">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6374">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6374">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6380">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6380">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6381">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6381">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6382">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6382">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6383">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6383">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6384">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6384">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6385">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6385">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6386">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6386">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6387">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6387">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6389">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6389">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6390">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6390">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6391">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6393">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6393">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6395">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6395">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6396">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6396">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6397">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6397">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6398">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6399">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6399">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6402">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6402">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6403">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6403">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6404">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6410">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6410">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6411">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6411">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6412">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6413">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6413">nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6414">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6415">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6415">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6416">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6417">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6417">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6418">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6419">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6420">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6420">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6421">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6421">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6422">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6422">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6423">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6423">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6448">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6448">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6449">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6449">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6450">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6451">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6451">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6452">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6453">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6453">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6454">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6454">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6455">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6455">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6456">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6457">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6457">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6459">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6459">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6460">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6460">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6461">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6461">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6471">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6471">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6477">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6477">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6478">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6478">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6479">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6480">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6480">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6482">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6482">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6483">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6484">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6484">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6485">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6486">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6486">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6487">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6487">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6488">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6488">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6489">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6489">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6490">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6490">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6491">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6491">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6492">Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6492">Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6497">cod unic identificare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6497">cod unic identificare</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6541">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6541">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6542">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6542">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6543">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6544">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6544">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6546">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6546">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6547">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6548">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6549">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6550">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6551">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6551">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6552">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6552">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6553">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6553">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6554">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6554">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6555">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6555">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6556">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6556">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6557">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6557">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6558">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6558">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6559">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6559">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6562">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6562">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6564">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6564">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6566">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6566">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6569">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6569">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6570">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6570">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6621">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6621">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6622">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6623">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6623">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6625">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6625">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6626">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6626">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6627">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6627">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6628">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6628">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6629">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6629">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6630">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6630">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6631">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6632">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6632">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6634">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6635">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6635">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6636">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6636">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6637">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6637">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6640">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6640">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6643">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6643">passportno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6645">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6645">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6646">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6646">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6647">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6647">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6648">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6648">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6653">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6653">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6654">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6655">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6655">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6657">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6657">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6658">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6658">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6659">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6659">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6660">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6660">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6661">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6662">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6663">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6665">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6665">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6666">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6666">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6683">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6683">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6684">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6684">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6685">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6685">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6686">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6686">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6687">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6687">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6688">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6689">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6689">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6692">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6692">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6693">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6693">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6694">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6694">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6695">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6695">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6698">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6698">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6699">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6699">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6700">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6700">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6702">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6702">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6703">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6703">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6704">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6704">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6705">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6705">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6706">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6706">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6707">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6707">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6708">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6709">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6711">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6712">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6712">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6713">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6713">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6716">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6716">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6728">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6728">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6729">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6730">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6731">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6731">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6733">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6733">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6734">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6734">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6735">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6735">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6736">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6737">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6739">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6740">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6740">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6741">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6741">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6757">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6757">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6758">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6758">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6759">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6760">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6760">ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6761">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6762">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6762">ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6763">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6764">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6764">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6767">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6767">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6768">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6768">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6769">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6770">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6770">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
