## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6817">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6817">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6818">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6818">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6820">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6820">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6822">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6822">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6823">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6824">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6824">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6825">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6826">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6827">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6827">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6828">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6828">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6829">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6830">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6830">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6831">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6831">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6832">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6832">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6833">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6833">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6834">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6834">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6835">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6835">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6836">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6836">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6837">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6838">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6838">ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6840">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6840">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6841">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6842">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6842">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6843">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6845">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6845">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6846">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6846">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6893">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6893">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6894">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6894">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6895">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6896">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6896">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6898">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6898">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6899">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6900">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6900">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6901">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6902">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6903">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6903">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6904">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6904">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6906">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6906">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6915">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6915">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6916">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6916">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6917">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6917">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6918">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6918">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6919">vozniško dovoljenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6919">vozniško dovoljenje</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6920">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6920">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6921">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6921">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6922">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6923">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6923">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6925">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6925">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6926">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6926">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6927">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6927">two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6928">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6928">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6929">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6929">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6931">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6934">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6934">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6935">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6935">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6936">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6936">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6937">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6937">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6965">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6965">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6966">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6966">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6967">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6968">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6970">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6971">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6972">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6973">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6974">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6975">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6978">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6979">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6979">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6980">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6981">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6981">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6982">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6982">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6983">슬로베니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6983">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6984">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6984">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6985">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6985">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6986">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6986">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6987">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6987">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6988">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6989">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6989">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6990">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6991">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6991">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6992">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6993">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6993">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6994">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6995">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6995">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6996">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6996">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6997">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6997">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6998">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6998">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-6999">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-6999">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7000">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7000">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7001">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7001">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7002">davčna številka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7002">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7003">identifikacijska številka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7003">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7004">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7004">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7023">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7023">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7024">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7025">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7025">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7027">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7027">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7028">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7028">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7029">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7029">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7030">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7030">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7031">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7031">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7032">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7032">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7033">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7034">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7034">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7035">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7036">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7036">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7037">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7037">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7038">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7038">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7039">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7039">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7045">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7045">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7046">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7047">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7047">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7049">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7049">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7050">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7050">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7051">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7051">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7052">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7052">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7053">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7053">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7054">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7054">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7055">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7055">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7056">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7057">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7058">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7059">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7059">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7060">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7060">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7061">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7061">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7062">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7062">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7063">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7064">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7064">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7065">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7071">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7071">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7073">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7073">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7074">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7074">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7075">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7075">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7076">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7076">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7077">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7077">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7078">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7078">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7079">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7079">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7080">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7080">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7081">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7082">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7085">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7086">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7086">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7101">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7101">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7102">영향 요소 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7102">drivers licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7103">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7103">drivers license number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7123">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7123">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7124">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7125">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7126">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7126">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7128">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7128">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7129">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7129">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7130">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7130">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7132">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7132">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7135">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7135">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7136">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7136">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7150">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7150">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7151">nie #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7151">nie#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7155">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7155">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7156">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7156">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7157">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7157">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7158">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7158">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7159">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7159">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7160">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7160">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7161">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7161">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7162">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7162">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7163">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7163">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7164">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7164">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7165">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7165">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7166">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7166">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7167">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7167">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7168">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7169">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7170">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7170">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7173">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7173">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7174">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7174">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7175">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7175">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7176">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7176">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7186">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7186">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7187">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7187">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7189">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7189">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7191">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7191">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7192">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7192">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7193">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7193">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7194">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7194">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7195">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7195">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7196">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7196">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7197">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7198">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7198">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7199">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7201">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7201">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7202">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7202">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7203">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7203">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7204">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7204">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7205">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7205">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7206">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7206">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7207">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7208">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7208">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7209">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7210">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7210">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7211">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7211">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7212">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7212">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7213">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7213">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7214">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7214">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7215">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7215">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7216">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7216">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7217">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7217">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7218">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7218">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7219">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7219">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7220">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7220">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7221">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7221">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7222">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7222">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7223">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7223">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7224">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7224">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7225">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7225">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7226">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7226">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7227">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7227">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7228">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7228">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7229">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7230">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7230">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7231">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7232">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7232">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7233">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7233">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7234">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7234">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7235">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7235">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7236">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7236">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7267">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7267">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7269">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7269">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7270">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7271">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7271">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7272">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7272">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7273">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7273">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7274">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7274">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7275">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7275">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7276">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7276">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7277">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7277">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7278">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7279">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7279">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7281">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7282">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7282">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7283">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7283">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7284">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7284">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7285">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7285">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7286">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7286">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7287">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7287">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7288">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7288">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7289">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7289">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7290">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7290">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7291">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7291">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7292">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7292">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7293">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7293">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7294">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7294">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7295">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7295">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7296">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7296">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7297">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7297">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7298">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7298">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7299">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7299">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7300">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7300">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7301">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7301">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7302">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7302">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7303">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7303">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7304">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7304">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7305">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7305">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7306">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7306">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7307">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7307">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7308">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7308">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7309">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7309">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7310">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7310">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7311">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7311">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7312">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7312">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7313">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7313">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7314">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7314">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7315">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7316">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7316">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7317">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7318">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7318">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7319">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7319">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7320">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7320">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7321">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7321">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7322">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7323">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7325">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7325">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7326">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7326">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7327">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7328">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7328">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7329">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7329">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7330">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7330">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7331">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7331">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7332">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7332">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7333">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7333">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7334">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7334">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7335">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7335">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7336">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7336">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7337">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7337">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7338">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7338">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7339">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7339">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7340">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7340">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7341">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7341">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7342">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7342">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7343">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7343">Sweden national ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7344">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7344">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7345">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7346">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7346">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7348">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7348">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7349">2-4 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7349">two to four digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7350">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7350">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7351">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7351">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7352">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7352">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7353">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7354">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7354">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7357">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7357">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7358">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7359">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7359">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7360">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7361">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7361">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7362">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7362">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7363">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7364">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7364">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7365">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7366">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7366">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7367">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7368">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7368">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7369">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7370">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7370">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7371">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7371">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7372">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7372">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7373">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7373">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7374">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7374">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7396">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7396">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7397">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7397">パスポート＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7398">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7398">Numéro de passeport</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7399">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7399">Passeport n °</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7400">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7400">Passeport Non</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7401">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7401">Passeport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7402">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7402">Passeport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7403">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7403">PasseportNon</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7404">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7404">Passeportn °</span></span> 

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7405">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7405">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7406">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7407">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7408">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7408">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7409">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7410">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7410">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7411">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7411">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7412">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7412">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7413">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7413">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7414">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7414">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7415">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7415">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7416">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7417">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7417">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7418">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7419">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7420">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7420">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7421">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7421">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7422">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7422">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7423">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7423">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7428">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7428">personal id no</span></span>
