## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7439">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7439">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7440">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7440">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7441">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7442">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7442">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7443">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7444">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7444">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7445">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7445">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7446">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7446">a plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7447">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7447">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7448">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7448">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7449">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7449">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7450">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7450">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7452">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7455">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7455">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7456">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7456">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7458">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7458">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7484">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7484">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7486">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7486">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7488">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7488">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7489">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7489">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7490">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7490">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7491">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7491">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7492">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7492">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7493">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7493">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7495">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7495">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7497">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7498">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7498">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7499">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7499">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7533">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7533">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7534">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7535">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7535">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7536">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7537">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7537">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7538">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7538">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7539">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7539">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7540">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7540">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7541">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7541">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7542">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7542">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7543">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7543">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7544">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7544">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7545">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7546">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7546">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7547">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7548">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7548">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7549">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7549">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7550">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7550">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7552">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7552">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7572">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7573">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7573">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7574">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7575">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7575">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7576">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7577">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7577">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7578">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7578">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7579">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7579">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7580">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7580">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7582">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7585">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7585">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7586">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7586">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7587">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7587">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7589">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7589">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7590">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7590">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7591">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7591">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7592">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7592">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7607">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7607">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7608">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7608">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7609">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7609">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7610">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7610">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7611">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7612">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7612">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7613">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7613">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7614">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7614">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7615">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7615">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7616">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7616">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7617">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7621">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7621">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7622">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7622">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7623">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7623">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7626">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7626">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7627">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7627">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7628">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7628">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7629">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7629">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7630">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7630">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7631">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7631">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7632">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7632">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7633">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7633">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7635">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7635">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7637">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7637">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7638">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7638">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7639">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7639">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7640">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7641">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7641">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7642">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7644">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7644">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7645">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7645">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7659">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7659">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7661">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7661">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7663">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7663">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7664">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7664">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7665">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7665">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7666">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7667">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7667">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7669">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7670">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7670">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7671">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7671">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7673">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7673">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7674">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7674">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7675">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7675">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7676">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7676">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7677">Id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7677">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7678">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7678">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7679">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7679">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7680">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7680">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7681">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7681">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7682">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7682">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7684">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7684">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7686">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7686">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7687">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7688">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7688">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7689">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7691">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7691">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7692">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7692">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7694">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7694">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7695">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7696">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7696">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7697">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7697">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7700">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7700">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7701">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7701">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7702">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7702">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7703">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7703">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7705">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7705">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7707">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7707">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7708">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7708">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7709">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7709">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7710">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7710">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7711">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7711">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7712">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7712">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7716">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7717">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7717">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7718">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7718">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7719">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7719">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7737">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7737">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7738">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7738">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7739">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7740">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7740">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7741">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7742">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7742">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7743">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7744">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7744">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7745">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7746">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7747">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7747">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7748">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7749">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7749">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7750">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7750">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7753">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7753">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7754">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7754">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7755">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7755">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7756">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7756">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7757">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7758">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7758">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7760">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7760">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7761">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7761">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7762">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7762">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7763">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7763">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7764">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7764">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7765">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7765">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7766">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7767">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7769">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7769">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7770">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7770">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7771">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7771">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7772">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7772">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7773">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7773">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7774">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7774">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7775">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7776">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7776">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7786">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7786">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7787">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7787">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7788">G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7788">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7789">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7789">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7790">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7790">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7791">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7791">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7792">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7792">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7793">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7793">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7794">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7794">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7795">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7795">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7796">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7797">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7797">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7799">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7799">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7800">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7800">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7801">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7801">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7802">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7802">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7803">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7803">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7804">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7804">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7805">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7805">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7806">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7806">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7807">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7807">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7808">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7808">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7809">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7809">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7810">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7810">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7811">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7811">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7812">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7812">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7813">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7813">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7814">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7814">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7815">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7815">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7816">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7816">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7817">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7817">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7818">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7818">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7819">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7820">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7820">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7821">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7821">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7843">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7843">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7844">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7844">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7845">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7845">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7846">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7846">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7847">UTR (unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7847">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7848">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7848">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7849">UTR (unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7849">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7850">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7854">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7854">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7855">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7855">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7866">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7866">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7875">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7875">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7876">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7877">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7877">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7879">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7879">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7880">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7881">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7883">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7884">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7884">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7885">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7885">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7886">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7886">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_usa_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7887">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7887">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7915">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7915">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7916">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7917">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7917">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7918">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7919">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7919">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7920">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7920">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7921">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7921">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7922">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7923">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7925">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7926">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7926">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7927">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7927">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7928">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7928">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7929">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7929">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7930">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7930">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7931">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7931">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7932">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7932">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-7933">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-7933">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8031">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8031">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8032">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8032">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8033">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8033">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8034">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8034">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8035">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8035">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8036">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8036">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8037">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8037">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8038">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8038">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8039">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8039">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8040">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8040">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8041">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8041">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8042">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8042">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8043">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8043">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8044">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8044">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8045">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8045">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8046">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8046">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8047">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8047">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8048">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8049">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8049">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8050">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8051">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8051">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8052">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8052">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8053">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8053">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8054">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8054">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8055">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8055">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8056">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8056">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8057">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8057">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8058">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8058">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8059">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8059">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8060">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8060">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8061">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8061">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8062">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8062">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8063">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8063">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8084">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8084">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8085">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8086">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8086">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8087">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8087">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8089">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8089">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8090">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8090">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8091">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8091">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8092">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8092">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8093">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8093">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8094">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8095">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8095">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8098">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8098">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8099">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8099">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8101">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8101">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8102">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8102">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8103">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8103">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8104">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8104">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8105">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8105">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8106">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8106">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8107">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8107">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8108">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8108">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8123">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8123">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8124">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8124">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8125">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8125">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8126">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8126">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8127">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8128">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8128">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8130">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8130">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8132">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8135">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8135">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8136">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8136">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8157">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8157">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8158">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8159">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8159">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8160">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8161">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8161">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8162">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8163">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8163">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8164">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8165">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8166">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8166">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8167">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8167">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8168">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8168">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8170">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8170">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8171">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8171">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8172">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8172">passport no</span></span>
