- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8174">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8174">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8175">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8175">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8176">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8176">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8178">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8178">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8180">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8180">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8181">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8181">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8182">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8182">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8183">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8184">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8184">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8185">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8186">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8187">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8187">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8188">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8188">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8189">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8189">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8190">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8190">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8191">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8191">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8192">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8192">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8193">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8193">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8194">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8194">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="dbd32-8195">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dbd32-8195">номер паспорта</span></span>
